00054 template <typename T> class aiMatrix4x4t;
00055 template <typename T> class aiVector2t;
00056 
00057 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00066 template <typename TReal>
00067 class aiMatrix3x3t
00068 {
00069 public:
00070 
00071     aiMatrix3x3t () :
00072         a1(static_cast<TReal>(1.0f)), a2(), a3(),
00073         b1(), b2(static_cast<TReal>(1.0f)), b3(),
00074         c1(), c2(), c3(static_cast<TReal>(1.0f)) {}
00075 
00076     aiMatrix3x3t (  TReal _a1, TReal _a2, TReal _a3,
00077                     TReal _b1, TReal _b2, TReal _b3,
00078                     TReal _c1, TReal _c2, TReal _c3) :
00079         a1(_a1), a2(_a2), a3(_a3),
00080         b1(_b1), b2(_b2), b3(_b3),
00081         c1(_c1), c2(_c2), c3(_c3)
00082     {}
00083 
00084 public:
00085 
00086     // matrix multiplication.
00087     aiMatrix3x3t& operator *= (const aiMatrix3x3t& m);
00088     aiMatrix3x3t  operator  * (const aiMatrix3x3t& m) const;
00089 
00090     // array access operators
00091     TReal* operator[]       (unsigned int p_iIndex);
00092     const TReal* operator[] (unsigned int p_iIndex) const;
00093 
00094     // comparison operators
00095     bool operator== (const aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& m) const;
00096     bool operator!= (const aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& m) const;
00097 
00098     bool Equal(const aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& m, TReal epsilon = 1e-6) const;
00099 
00100     template <typename TOther>
00101     operator aiMatrix3x3t<TOther> () const;
00102 
00103 public:
00104 
00105     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00109     explicit aiMatrix3x3t( const aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& pMatrix);
00110 
00111     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00114     aiMatrix3x3t& Transpose();
00115 
00116     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00121     aiMatrix3x3t& Inverse();
00122     TReal Determinant() const;
00123 
00124 public:
00125     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00131     static aiMatrix3x3t& RotationZ(TReal a, aiMatrix3x3t& out);
00132 
00133     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00141     static aiMatrix3x3t& Rotation( TReal a,
00142         const aiVector3t<TReal>& axis, aiMatrix3x3t& out);
00143 
00144     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00150     static aiMatrix3x3t& Translation( const aiVector2t<TReal>& v, aiMatrix3x3t& out);
00151 
00152     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00161     static aiMatrix3x3t& FromToMatrix(const aiVector3t<TReal>& from,
00162         const aiVector3t<TReal>& to, aiMatrix3x3t& out);
00163

00167     TReal c1, c2, c3;
00168 };
